how.title: My involvement
how.content: I was responsible for all front end development - We produced many wireframes, POCs and bespoke functionality.
how.thoughts:
One of my favourite parts of this build was the microsite for 'Monster Practice'. I integrated some smooth scrolling and gallery features with the CMS, ensuring WYSIWYG editability.

The ecommerce checkout was a very bespoke build - I really enjoyed building the various checkout flows and features such as postcode lookups and address selections.
